content: As your first real boss encounter, you should be prepared for big hits that can take a chunk out of your health, so it’s not a bad idea to make sure you’ve rested up and refilled your healing gourd before taking him on.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bullguard.md', within the main section titled 'Bullguard', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Bullguard' and the sub-subsection 'Bullguard Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
As your first real boss encounter, you should be prepared for big hits that can take a chunk out of your health, so it’s not a bad idea to make sure you’ve rested up and refilled your healing gourd before taking him on.
